about_the_game: The Hatoful Boyfriend: Holiday Star - Dove, Actually Edition upgrade includes the full digital soundtrack, Holiday Star Dossier digital booklet, The King's Story Book, and a collection of Hatoful Boyfriend: Holiday Star wallpapers.
